name: Hover Effects For Visual Composer
author: themebon

sections.description:
Checkout our Latest WordPress Themes – 100% Free

Hover Effects For Visual Composer wordpress plugin is an impressive hover effects powered by pure CSS3 and iHover.

Amazing hover effects for visual composer is an impressive hover effects collection, powered by pure CSS3 and iHover, no dependency. 76+ effects to choose and 5 styles.

Live Demo

Features

  • Super easy Installation.
  • Pure CSS3 Effects.
  • 76+ Hover Effects.
  • 5 Styles (Circle, Square, Square 2, Caption).
  • Animation directions.
  • SEO friendly.
  • Easy user interface.
  • Amazing option panel.
  • Unlimited hover items.
  • User friendly customization.
  • All Major browser supported.

Pro Version Features

  • Fully Responsive.
  • 87+ Hover Effects.
  • 6 Styles (Circle, Square, Square 2, Caption, Jibon, Others).
  • Unlimited hover items.
  • Custom thumbnail width.
  • Custom thumbnail height.
  • Tons of customization option.
  • Custom background color.
  • Custom font size both heading & description.
  • 650+ Google fonts.
  • Unlimited heading font color.
  • Unlimited description font color.
  • Show / Hide texts underline.
  • Texts adjustments.
  • Custom thumbnails adjustment.
  • External link for each hover item.
  • Show/Hide border.
  • Open link in new tab.
  • Very easy video tutorial.
  • 24/7 Support.
  • Support within 12 hours.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin. First you need to install Visual Composer plugin then install Hover Effects For Visual Composer.

This addon plugin works like other page builder addon plugin. Go to new page then click on Visual Composer builder then click on Add Element you should see Hover Effects menu as Name “Hover Effects” on Menu Top, click on it you will see Hover Effects then click on it and browse an image and customize according to your needs.
